name: Super Pop It Simulator: ASMR
description:
When you are tired and you want to get distracted to relieve tension and stress, there is nothing better than Pop it Fidget Toy .

Simple dimple, Mini pop, Pop it all use autonomous sensory meridional response (ASMR) to relax your mind and give you an unforgettable experience. no need to go anywhere, enjoy the amazing Pop it Fidget Toy experience right on your phone or tablet. You have the opportunity to experience real life and treat it like real Pop it.

Pop it Fidget Toy, has a variety of mesmerizing shapes and colors that you can play. You just pop bubbles on a toy that has many different shapes such as heart, rectangle, star, unicorn, flower to pop and enjoy the sound.

If you like Simple dimple, Mini pop then you need to install our free application on your device. So that you, too, can enjoy relaxing sound, and relieve stress and anxiety, because that's what Pop it Fidget Toy is for.

Features of the

Pop it Fidget Toy - employs autonomous sensory meridional response (ASMR)

Similar to Simple dimple, Mini pop
